entry.title: Editor - document #270: OCCI - Compute Resource Templates Profile
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to author action
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Richard Hughes-Jones

Dear authors/editors: The OCCI document public comment has completed. There have been some comments received. The next step is for you to consider whether any changes are needed to the submitted documents, and if so the changes should be applied. Then, use this tracker to inform the standards council the documents are ready for final review prior to publication. Write back, here or via email, with any questions or concerns. Thanks,
Greg
